abstract: Representative Aaron Schock, Republican of Illinois, who decorated his House office as if it were the set of “Downton Abbey,” made his final speech on Capitol Hill on Thursday.

headline.main: Verbatim: Schock Says So Long to Congress

snippet: Representative Aaron Schock, Republican of Illinois, who decorated his House office as if it were the set of “Downton Abbey,” made his final speech on Capitol Hill on Thursday.
